message.content:
Packages Used: psutil, os, shutil

Functionalities: 
1. get_available_disks() - Retrieves the list of available disks or volumes on the system.
2. wipe_disk_dd(disk_path) - Wipes the contents of a disk using the dd command-line tool.
3. wipe_disk_shutil(disk_path) - Overwrites the contents of a disk with random data using the shutil package.
4. wipe_mbr_dd(disk_path) - Wipes the Master Boot Record (MBR) of a disk using the dd command-line tool.

Please note that the disk wipe operations can potentially cause data loss. Proper caution and authorization are required before performing these operations.
